content.prompt: The House of the Vettii included wall paintings and a peristyle garden for which of the following reasons?

choices.label: To symbolize paradise through flowing water and vegetation
To enable and provide space for funerary rituals
To impress visitors with the wealth and taste of the patrons
To provide a setting for mystery rites

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
